author: bentmann
msg: o Disabled test for Maven 3.x (reporting and build are completely isolated)

author: arkurth
msg: Added configure_time_synchronization() subroutine to Windows.pm. It configures the Windows time service and executes the synchronization command. Added call to this subroutine from post_load so that time is configured and synchronized on load.

author: maxberger
msg: Support loading of ICC Profiles from PNG and JPEG when used through ImageIO

author: gbrown
msg: Simplify handling of component attributes - eliminate Attributes base class and move event processing into static setter methods.
